      • build3DSweep

        public static void build3DSweep(BSpline crossSection,
                BSpline sweepCurve,
                MeshData data,
                float scale)
        Given a closed curve and a sweep curve, fill the three GLBuffer objects appropriately. Here, we sweep the closed curve along the sweep curve
        Parameters:
        crossSection, - the BSpline cross section
        sweepCurve, - the BSpline we are sweeping along
        data, - a MeshData where we will output our triangle mesh
        scale - > 0, parameter that controls how big the closed curve with respect to the sweep curve
